NK036(chi)006:0: smug nag khros ma rag gdong ma'i dus gnad nges
NK036(chi)006:1: pa bzhugs so rgya gar skad du &&& bod skad
NK036(chi)006:2: du smug nag khros ma zhes bya ba mngon rdzogs
NK036(chi)006:3: yab la phyag 'tshal lo sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung
NK036(chi)006:4: don du smug nag khros ma rag gdong ma'i nag
NK036(chi)006:5: mo khros ma gsang ba'i rgyud le'u brgya dang rtsa
NK036(chi)006:6: brgyad las shan pa gsod par byed pa yi las
NK036(chi)006:7: mtha' bsam gyis mi khyab kyang 'dir ni gsang chen
NK036(chi)006:8: dril ba yi nges par gnad du bsdus pa la
NK036(chi)006:9: srog la nges par bab pa yi ma mo nges
NK036(chi)006:10: par rgyu ba yi dus la brten nas las kyi
NK036(chi)006:11: mtha' rnam pa gnyis su gsungs pa la ma mo
NK036(chi)006:12: nyid kyi rang gshed dang dgra rnams srog la za
NK036(chi)006:13: ba yi sbyor ba nges par bstan pa la 'dir
NK036(chi)006:14: ni gnyis kyi nges pa'i gnad 'khrul pa med pa'i
NK036(chi)006:15: rnal 'byor las nges par 'grub pa'i sngags kyi gnad
NK036(chi)006:16: las kyi thus ka bstan pa ni nges par lo
NK036(chi)006:17: gcig zla ba yang bcu gnyis rim par ma nor
NK036(chi)006:18: bas nges par gtan la phab byas te dgun dbyar
NK036(chi)006:19: ston dpyid zla ba la gsum gsum kho na nges
NK036(chi)006:20: rtsis pas dgun zla dang po'i nya dang stong 'bring
NK036(chi)006:21: po brgyad dang nyi shu gnyis tha ma bcu gcig
NK036(chi)006:22: nyi shu lnga dpyid kyi dang po bzhi dang dgu
NK036(chi)006:23: 'bring po bcu dang nyi shu dgu tha ma tshes
NK036(chi)006:24: gsum nyi shu brgyad dbyar gyi dang po bcu bdun
NK036(chi)006:25: la nyi shu dag kyang de bzhin bdun 'bring po
NK036(chi)006:26: bcu dang nyi shu gcig tha ma bcu drug nyer
NK036(chi)006:27: bdun yin ston gyi dang po tshes drug dang nyi
NK036(chi)006:28: shu gsum la nges par rol 'bring po bcu dgu
NK036(chi)006:29: nyi shu gcig tha ma gnyis dang nyi shu brgyad
NK036(chi)006:30: / de ltar zla ba bcu gnyis la rgyu ba'i
NK036(chi)006:31: zhag ni nyi shu bzhi lhag ma dag las rdugs
NK036(chi)006:32: par 'gyur de ltar nyi shu rtsa bzhi la nges
NK036(chi)006:33: par byas nas grub par nges de la nges pa'i
NK036(chi)006:34: gnad phye na nyin mo rgyu ba gsum las med
NK036(chi)006:35: lhag ma mtshan mo rgyu ba yin dgun 'bring dang
NK036(chi)006:36: po srod dang mjing gnyis pa nyi shu rde'u nag
NK036(chi)006:37: gsum pa phyed gong phyed tshad do dpyid zla dang
NK036(chi)006:38: po phyed yol dang de yi cha las rlung ni
NK036(chi)006:39: yang sum cu rtsa gnyis dag la'o 'bring po de
NK036(chi)006:40: nas drug cu bzhi tha chung de nas rlung nyer
NK036(chi)006:41: gnyis so dbyar ni dang po rlung bcu yin phyed
NK036(chi)006:42: dang bdun dang nyi shu ste 'bring po la ni
NK036(chi)006:43: / / tha chung de bzhin drug gi cha ston
NK036(chi)006:44: gyi dang po rlung bzhi cha 'bring po nam ma'i
NK036(chi)006:45: mtha' la'o de yi 'og ma nyi shar dus tha
NK036(chi)006:46: chung de nas nyin phyed dang de nas mtshan mo
NK036(chi)006:47: bar dag yin de ni dus nges pa'i phyogs brtag
NK036(chi)006:48: pa'o smug nag 'jigs pa'i ma mo nyid nges par
NK036(chi)006:49: rgyu ba'i dus ni 'di dag go zla ba dang
NK036(chi)006:50: po bzhi la bsad pa'i dus bzhi yod do dgun
NK036(chi)006:51: gyi dang pho nya la shar nas nub tu nges
NK036(chi)006:52: par 'gyu bas dgra bo'i ling ga rgya shog la
NK036(chi)006:53: bris la dur khrod kyi shing bu la bskyon la
NK036(chi)006:54: kha shar du bstan la de'i mdun du bong ba'i
NK036(chi)006:55: rdzas kyis bdug pa'i tshul du btang la rang gshin
NK036(chi)006:56: rje gshed kyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs la ling
NK036(chi)006:57: ga'i rgyab nas nyung nag dang btsan dug la sngags
NK036(chi)006:58: 'dis brab bo ma m+aa srog sdug sdug lam sod
NK036(chi)006:59: rag mo snying sa m+aa ya b+h+yo b+h+yoh zhes brgya
NK036(chi)006:60: rtsa brgyad kyis nges par 'grub bo dpyid kyi dang
NK036(chi)006:61: po'i tshes dgu la nub nas shar du 'gyu ste
NK036(chi)006:62: yang ling ga yang nub nas shar du kha bstan
NK036(chi)006:63: la bdag nyid kyi gdong la dur khrod kyi sol
NK036(chi)006:64: ba byugs la skra spyi bo'i gtsug tu bcings la
NK036(chi)006:65: khrag sna tshogs la sngags 'dis brab bo tsa ts+aa
NK036(chi)006:66: sha sh+aa khrag snying 'dir shag lu'u tsa ts+aa ya
NK036(chi)006:67: / / ma h+aa / snying dar snying thum shig
NK036(chi)006:68: ya ma e ka dza ti srog thun rbad ces
NK036(chi)006:69: stong phrag gcig bzlas pas 'grub bo dbyar gyi dang
NK036(chi)006:70: po nyer bzhi la lho nas byang du nges par
NK036(chi)006:71: 'gyu bas yang ling ga la sogs pa gong ltar
NK036(chi)006:72: bcas la bdag nyid gcer bur phyung la thal chen
NK036(chi)006:73: la sngags 'di bzlas la brab bo raka mo raka
NK036(chi)006:74: mo snying sha ku ru dza dzah snying shag khos
NK036(chi)006:75: zhes brgyas nges par 'grub bo ston zla dang po'i
NK036(chi)006:76: nyi shu gsum la byang nas lhor 'gyu ste yang
NK036(chi)006:77: ling+ga yang kha byang du bstan la bdag nyid shog
NK036(chi)006:78: gu'i 'bag gyon la bya mo nag mo'i sgo nga
NK036(chi)006:79: la sngags 'di stong bzlas bsreg go ma m+aa e
NK036(chi)006:80: ka dza ti snying thum dzah zhes brjod pas nges
NK036(chi)006:81: par 'grub bo de dag ni khyad par du ma
NK036(chi)006:82: mo srog la 'jug pa'i dus nges pa'o 'di'i dus
NK036(chi)006:83: na ma nor bar las la sbyar na dgra gang
NK036(chi)006:84: yin pa'i krog nges par chad do de ma yin
NK036(chi)006:85: lhag ma'i dus nyi shu'i dus rnams su yang dpal
NK036(chi)006:86: nag mo khros ma la gtor ma dbul zhing las
NK036(chi)006:87: bcol lo ma mo'i las bzlog cing rang gshed la
NK036(chi)006:88: 'bebs par 'dod na dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor
NK036(chi)006:89: lo rtsibs bzhi pa zhig bris la sngags gong ma
NK036(chi)006:90: bzhi po phyogs ma log par bris la lte ba
NK036(chi)006:91: la dgra gang yin pa'i ming rus ra khrag gis
NK036(chi)006:92: bris la ma mo'i bsad pa'i thun sngags rnams bzlog
NK036(chi)006:93: la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas la zangs
NK036(chi)006:94: phye dang lcags phye la sngags 'di bzlas shing brabs
NK036(chi)006:95: la de nas dgra bo'i gzugs bag zan dang rkang
NK036(chi)006:96: rjes kyi sa la sogs pa la snying khar 'khor
NK036(chi)006:97: lo de dril la bcug la de la tsher ma
NK036(chi)006:98: sna tshogs btsugs la ma mo gang nas 'gyu ba'i
NK036(chi)006:99: ngos su kha bstan la dpal e ka dza t+ai'i
NK036(chi)006:100: tsakli sku mdog smug nag skra grol ba zhal bgrad
NK036(chi)006:101: mche ba gtsigs pa spyi bo'i gtsug na ral pa
NK036(chi)006:102: kham nig gyen la 'khyil ba dbu la thod pa'i
NK036(chi)006:103: phreng bas brgyan pa dpral ba'i dkyil na spyan gcig
NK036(chi)006:104: khrag mig tu khol ba mchee ba gcig gsod pa'i
NK036(chi)006:105: phyir rab tu brdar ba g.yas na tsit+ta dmar po
NK036(chi)006:106: bsnams nas zhal du gsol ba g.yon pa zhing chung
NK036(chi)006:107: gi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa zhig bris la gang nas
NK036(chi)006:108: 'gyu ba'i ngos su ling ga bstan la de'i bar
NK036(chi)006:109: du gu gul sbyar ma dang khyi lud dang yugs
NK036(chi)006:110: sa mo'i dor rta dang skra la sogs pa mi
NK036(chi)006:111: gtsang ba'i rdzas kyis bdug go bdag nyid ma mo'i
NK036(chi)006:112: rgyab kyi ngos nas mkhar ba'i phye ma sngags 'dis
NK036(chi)006:113: brab bo ro ru e ka dza ti snying kha
NK036(chi)006:114: rag ru lu ru lu h+aum b+h+yo h+aum /
NK036(chi)006:115: zhes pa rtag tu bzlas shing gtor ma btang bka'
NK036(chi)006:116: bsgo zhing gzir na ma mo nyid rab tu khros
NK036(chi)006:117: nas dgra bo gang yin pa de'i srod gcod nges
NK036(chi)006:118: so 'di ni gong ma'i las ma 'grub na bya
NK036(chi)006:119: ba yin gyis gang ltar snang snang du bya ba
NK036(chi)006:120: ni ma yin no de ltar byas la ma mo
NK036(chi)006:121: dbugs 'byin pa'i cho ga bya'o a mri ta dang
NK036(chi)006:122: gtor mas mchod cing bskang ngo de nas yang dgra
NK036(chi)006:123: la bskul zhing 'bod rbad kyi las bya'o gong ma
NK036(chi)006:124: 'bod pa'o rbad pa ni +amo ma ma trag rag
NK036(chi)006:125: sha snying thums rbad myogs thum thum rbad myogs thum
NK036(chi)006:126: thum rbad snying gzer sgrog 'dar yid chum srog prig
NK036(chi)006:127: prig sham khyer b+h+yo zhes 'gyu ba'i dus rnams su
NK036(chi)006:128: rbad do bsad pa ni gong ma'i sngags tshan bzhi
NK036(chi)006:129: po yin no // snying sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma
NK036(chi)006:130: 'dis dbul lo 'bod pa'i sngags mjug la ma mo
NK036(chi)006:131: rag mo e ka dza ti i dam ba ling+ta
NK036(chi)006:132: kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi zhes pa lan bdun
NK036(chi)006:133: du dbul lo ma mo nges pa'i dus bzhi la
NK036(chi)006:134: lcags phye dang nyung kar nyung nag dang dug sna
NK036(chi)006:135: tshogs la rbad pa'i sngags bzlas la skyes pa'i grir
NK036(chi)006:136: shi ba'am rabs chad kyi snying gi nang du bcug
NK036(chi)006:137: la de'i phyi nas nag mo'i zan dron gyi gril
NK036(chi)006:138: la sgul thog gi nang du bcug cing dgra'i phyogs
NK036(chi)006:139: su 'phang ngo de ltar dus la 'khrul pa med
NK036(chi)006:140: cing sbyor ba ma log par byas na 'grub pa
NK036(chi)006:141: la the tshom med do zla ba bzhi po'i las
NK036(chi)006:142: sbyor rdzogs tsa na dgra bo 'gum pa la the
NK036(chi)006:143: tshom med do gal te pha rol po ma mo
NK036(chi)006:144: 'di nyid kyi sbyor ba shes pa yin na 'og
NK036(chi)006:145: ma las ldog par byas na de ltar lan bdun
NK036(chi)006:146: byas na kho rang gi srog khrag tu skyugs nas
NK036(chi)006:147: srog chad pa la the tshom byar med do de
NK036(chi)006:148: dag gi dus na ma mo las la bskul zhing
NK036(chi)006:149: rbad pa 'di skad do h+aum bskal pa me ltar
NK036(chi)006:150: 'bar ba'i dur khrod nas shin tu gsod pa'i smug
NK036(chi)006:151: nag khro mo ni nam mkha'i gzugs can lho sprin
NK036(chi)006:152: go zug can tsit+ta za zhing dam nyams snying khrag
NK036(chi)006:153: 'dren zhing chung dbyug pas dgra snying tshal par 'gems
NK036(chi)006:154: 'jigs byed chen por ral pa'i thor tshugs can dpral
NK036(chi)006:155: na mig gcig srid gsum khungs nas 'byin zhal nas
NK036(chi)006:156: tshems gcig dgra bo'i srog gcod ma tsit+ta 'di gsol
NK036(chi)006:157: dam tshig srog la rngams sha khrag longs spyod dmar
NK036(chi)006:158: gtor 'di bzhes la dam tshig dbang gis dam nyams
NK036(chi)006:159: gshed ma mdzod ma mo khrag la dgyes phyir 'di
NK036(chi)006:160: gsol la bdag gi las kun thogs med grub mdzod
NK036(chi)006:161: cig sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma 'di gsol la
NK036(chi)006:162: dam tshig dus la bab bo sa ma y+aa zhes
NK036(chi)006:163: rbad do ma mo snying thig gsang ba'i las gang
NK036(chi)006:164: dang yang mi 'dra ba rin po che'i yi ge
NK036(chi)006:165: bzhi la sogs pa'i bka' srung smug nag khros ma
